page_content: The page provides information on regulations and guidelines for veterinarians, including the disposal of medical waste and updates on animal diseases.
The page provides various training and technical materials for civil protection, including guides and manuals in different formats such as PDF, DOC, and XLS.
The page is not accessible (404 error).
The page discusses the harmonization of construction terms in Switzerland, specifically in the Canton of Z端rich, with the aim of standardizing key construction terms and measurements.
The page provides instructions on how to apply for a VeVA business number required for companies that dispose of special waste or other controlled waste in Switzerland.

The page describes a standardized, browser-based basic knowledge test developed by the Municipal Office of the Canton of Z端rich for the ordinary naturalization procedure, assessing knowledge about geographical, historical, political, and social conditions.

The page provides information on teaching German as a second language (DaZ) in the Canton of Z端rich, including guidelines, methods, and materials for teachers, as well as details on the assessment and allocation of students to DaZ programs.
The page provides a guide on how to access and download free geodata using the GIS-Browser of the Canton of Z端rich, including visual instructions and a video tutorial.
